QuestData.Title: Small, But Significant
QuestData.Description: I am tired, $n. I must rest.$B$BWe have a ritual to perform, but we require some of the charms from this grove. If you wander the grove, you should see them all over hanging from the trees. $B$BIf it does not offend one as young as you, will you permit me to sit and recover my strength while you gather these charms?
QuestData.CompletionText: Rest feels good. The burdens of life have become a great weight after so many years.
QuestData.RewardText: You come through, as you always have. You are truly one of my greatest students. I think you will be something the likes of which the world has never seen.
